item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 20, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. What the hell is an elliptic curve? (34 points | 6 comments)
2. Which year: guess which year each photo was taken (219 points | 84 comments)
3. Olympic Gold Medalist Dominates the 100M at Her Kid's Sports Day Event (47 points | 30 comments)
4. 100 Years to Solve an Integral (2020) (122 points | 24 comments)
5. Raspberry Pi Lidar Scanner (471 points | 138 comments)
6. Let's give PRO/VENIX a barely adequate, pre-C89 TCP/IP stack, featuring Slirp-CK (23 points | 1 comment)
7. Show HN: I built an AI that turns GitHub codebases into easy tutorials (351 points | 66 comments)
8. Novel color via stimulation of individual photoreceptors at population scale (106 points | 43 comments)
9. Pretty State Machine Patterns in Rust (79 points | 28 comments)
10. Librarians are dangerous (518 points | 502 comments)
11. First baby born in UK to woman with transplanted womb (260 points | 253 comments)
12. Claude Code: Best practices for agentic coding (457 points | 198 comments)
13. Android phones will soon reboot themselves after sitting unused for three days (341 points | 272 comments)
14. The AI skeptic's guide to AI collaboration (34 points | 34 comments)
15. Models of Ice Skating for the Development of Robotic Ice Skating Gaits [pdf] (2020) (10 points | 3 comments)
16. Everyone knows your location, Part 2: try it yourself and share the results (151 points | 26 comments)
17. A unique sound alleviates motion sickness (151 points | 68 comments)
18. Layered Design in Go (67 points | 7 comments)
19. Attention Spans for Math and Stories (2019) (4 points | discuss)
20. Welcome to the Era of Experience [pdf] (75 points | 23 comments)
21. Electromagnetism as a Purely Geometric Theory (112 points | 35 comments)
22. Ssl.com: DCV bypass and issue fake certificates for any MX hostname (186 points | 55 comments)
23. Silicon Valley crosswalk buttons apparently hacked to imitate Musk, Zuck voices (364 points | 112 comments)
24. Release: OLED Mode extension for Chrome (19 points | 10 comments)
25. The Icelandic Voting System (2024) (105 points | 90 comments)
26. Eccfrog512ck2: An Enhanced 512-Bit Weierstrass Elliptic Curve [pdf] (23 points | 5 comments)
27. Don't force your kids to do math (161 points | 192 comments)
28. Packing Input Frame Context in Next-Frame Prediction Models for Video Generation (252 points | 26 comments)
29. The Web Is Broken – Botnet Part 2 (353 points | 219 comments)
30. Restoring the Galaxian3 Theatre 6, 1992 six player arcade machine (212 points | 47 comments)
